title: PlayWise Hardware v1 Development Kit Specification
content:
# PlayWise v1 Development Kit Specification

## Overview
Minimal viable development kit for the PlayWise educational toy, focused on core interactions and rapid data collection.

## Core Components

### Computing Platform
- Raspberry Pi 4B 4GB
- 32GB MicroSD (Class 10)
- Raspberry Pi OS

### Power System
- USB-C Power Supply (5V 3A)
- Basic battery pack for testing
- Simple power switch

### Essential Sensors
1. Motion Detection
   - MPU-6050 accelerometer/gyroscope
   - Basic orientation detection
   - Simple gesture recognition

2. User Input
   - 2x large capacitive touch pads
   - Basic LED feedback
   - Simple button backup

3. Audio
   - Basic USB speaker
   - Simple USB microphone
   - Volume control

## Development Features

### Debug Interface
- USB access
- Basic GPIO breakout
- Power monitoring point

### Safety Features
- Basic temperature monitoring
- Simple voltage protection
- Emergency stop button

### Data Collection
- Motion patterns
- Touch interactions
- Basic audio recordings
- System performance

## Physical Design

### Construction
- Simple 3D printed shell
- Easy-open design
- Basic drop protection
- Access to all ports

### Assembly
- Minimal wiring
- Standard connectors
- Basic strain relief
- Clear labeling

## Testing

### Basic Tests
- Power on/off
- Sensor readings
- Audio playback
- Data logging

### Safety Checks
- Temperature check
- Sharp edge inspection
- Basic drop test
- Power safety
